lines.text: Bye, Tex. You're the only friend I had. At least I won't have to bury anyone else.
Sometimes people don't do what they set out to do, and sometimes that's for the best.
You want the gun? Take the damned gun. You people! You want my dog? You want the cow? Huh? Take the cow.
[the barbarian comes close enough for Sam to punch him to the ground]
